english.segment1: We are here together, its been so long. Ive waited forever, for this day to come. And I wont leave you. alone tonight. Youre my heart. moving life inside
english.segment2: We won't fall again, if you will let me lead. Well fall in love, if you will hold to me. Never let go, endure the pain to find no pain at all
english.segment3: Forget all the records, previous lovers. Look into my eyes, to dissolve the others. Cause I know where. you have laid tonight. Im just one step away tonight
english.segment4: Say that you need me, and I can give you everything your hearts been craving. Cause once Ive held your hand, I cannot stand, to see it waving goodbye
english.segment5: Please dont go. Stay with me. Just stay with me
